Synopsis (English):

In this sumptuous castle with huge rooms richly decorated, Babeth is soon going to discover women and men with strange behaviors: high society women in nice lingerie or dressed in leather offer themselves to their masters in total obedience. A movie in the great Marc Dorcel tradition, a high-class story with extreme refinement...
